title: Insoupçonnable
overview: Chloé Fisher, a brilliant Parisian criminologist, is sent to Lyon to investigate the murder of Adeline Moreau, the daughter-in-law of local lawmaker Damien Moreau. The killer is Paul Brodsky, a loving father who is above suspicion and just picked his next victim. This successful remake of the British series The Fall offers a chilling face-off in the Gallic capital.
